title: 567-908 Waypoint
setting: Scout base on 567-908, browny-grey rockball world
atmosphere: Remote, isolated, functional. A small scout waystation on a barren world. The landscape is browny-grey with no vegetation. Refueling takes time - water cracking for hydrogen.
description: One day layover at the scout waystation. Autumn Gold delivers cargo and refuels while Travellers can explore the base or rest.

key_dialogue.captain_announcement: We'll be here about a day. Water cracking takes time. Feel free to stretch your legs at the base, but we depart on schedule.

narrator_prompt: 567-908 is a browny-grey rockball - no atmosphere to speak of, no life, just rock and the small scout waystation. The day passes slowly as hydrogen is cracked from water. It's a reminder of how far from civilization this route runs.
